@avmgithub - Thanks for reporting this.

Or, if you remove [this line](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/ATen/native/cpu/SoftMaxKernel.cpp#L25) does that resolve your issues? There are also a few other places that use this. Could you try removing them as well?

If so I'll guard them using a macro (or remove them entirely), unless thread_local resolves this.
